column2: " ..... (b) In a case tried without a jury, as of right, from any conviction or sentence
the accused has pleaded guilty: or
the sentence is for a period of imprisonment of one month of whatsoever

column1: nature or a fine  not exceeding one hundred rupees

column2: Provided that in  every such case there shall be an appeal on a question of law

column1: or where the accused has pleaded on the question of sentence only.
